name: Five Nights at The Squad 2
description:
Welcome back to Seudflyer’s Burgers and Fries, night guard! It has been four months, and that previous night guard left by leaving her terrible reviews of the place. That doesn’t matter now, though! Four months of having our doors closed and revamping our entire restaurant wasn't for nothing! All you need to do is watch this wonderful new place that we’ve made. And, of course, as always, there’s never, under ANY circumstances, danger within our restaurant. Please refer to the manual in front of you for a general guide as to how to do your job.

Games based on the indie game franchise Five Nights at Freddy's by Scott Cawthon.

Controls - A, S, D, Mouse
